term.title: carbonyl compounds

item.text: Compounds containing the carbonyl group, C=O. The term is commonly used in the restricted sense of aldehydes and ketones, although it actually includes carboxylic acids and derivatives.
Metal carbonyls, in which carbon monoxide is a formal ligand.

term.sources: 'Glossary of class names of organic compounds and reactivity intermediates based on structure (IUPAC Recommendations 1995)' Moss, G.P.;Smith, P.A.S.;Tavernier, D.; Pure and Applied Chemistry 1995 67(8-9) 1307
